Author: adnam
Content: Yeah, I occasionally use it too.  have you seen the new buses that announce which stop you're arriving at (like in the metro)?

Author: epi0Bauqu
Content: Kozmo was great while it lasted in Boston. Movie & candy delivery right to Bexley on the cheap!  The demand was there at their original low prices--not sure what it would be farther up the demand curve, i.e. if the price was significantly higher.  I don't think the $10 minimum would hurt much (students can pool), but the $5 delivery charge might.
